name: Dreams Incorporated
description:
Thank you for choosing us as your treatment provider! You've filled out the forms? Excellent. You will need to answer some additional questions during the procedure, but don't fret too much about that. Are you ready? Swallow this, please. And then it's right through here. The assistant will be with you shortly...

A reflective game about giving up control.
 

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Any key/click to progress to next question

 

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020 in 48 hours with the theme 'Out of Control'.

A game by The Notepad Blood Pact Gang

Story by Jack Sanderson Thwaite

Music + Sound by Samuel Hollywood-Summers

Programming + Visuals by Jo Godfrey
